Class FESI.Exceptions.EcmaScriptLexicalException 

FESI.Exceptions.EcmaScriptException
   |
   +----FESI.Exceptions.EcmaScriptLexicalException
public class EcmaScriptLexicalException
extends EcmaScriptException
implements EcmaScriptConstants
Exception used to signal lexical error during parsing

EcmaScriptLexicalException(TokenMgrError, EvaluationSource)
Create a new lexical exception

getLineNumber()
Get the line number of the error if possible
getMessage()
Return the text of the token error and the location
isIncomplete()
Return true in case of unclosed comment, as in this case the statement is not complete and the user may be prompted to complete the statement.

EcmaScriptLexicalException 
 public EcmaScriptLexicalException(TokenMgrError e,
                                   EvaluationSource s)
Create a new lexical exception

Parameters:
e - The error from the token manager
s - The evaluation source location of the error

getLineNumber 
 public int getLineNumber()
Get the line number of the error if possible

 public String getMessage()
Return the text of the token error and the location

Overrides:

isIncomplete 
 public boolean isIncomplete()
Return true in case of unclosed comment, as in this case the statement is not complete and the user may be prompted to complete the statement.
